brief_summary.textblock:
The purpose of this study is to assess the safety and performance of the steroid-releasing
      S8 Sinus Implant when used in post sinus surgery patients who present with recurrent sinus
      obstruction.

clinical_study.brief_title: Safety and Performance of the Steroid-Releasing S8 Sinus Implant (S8 PK)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Diagnosis of chronic sinusitis

          -  Prior sinus surgery with ethmoidectomy

          -  Recurrent sinus obstruction due to polyps

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Required use of mometasone furoate

          -  Significant scarring of the sinus

clinical_study.official_title: A Clinical Evaluation of the Safety and Performance of the Steroid-Releasing S8 Sinus Implant When Used in Post-Sinus Surgery Patients With Recurrent Sinus Polyps

oversight_info.authority: United States: Food and Drug Administration

primary_outcome.measure: Successful deployment on implant into the ethmoid sinus

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Endpoint Classification: Pharmacokinetics Study, Intervention Model: Single Group Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Treatment
